scripts._dontuse:build: npm run clean && npm run logo && webpack --config webpack/webpack.config.js
scripts.build:deploy: npm run clean && npm run logo && webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-prod webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js
scripts.build:stage: npm run logo && GCLOUD_PROJECT=cactus-app-stage webpack --config webpack/webpack.deploy.config.js
scripts.deploy:stage: firebase deploy --only hosting -P stage && open https://cactus-app-stage.web.app
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase deploy --only hosting -P prod && open https://cactus.app
scripts.page:
echo "*********************
This command has been moved to the scripts directory
*********************
"
scripts.page:delete:
echo "*********************
This command has been moved to the scripts directory
*********************
"
scripts.predeploy: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:deploy && npm run copy
scripts.predeploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run copy
scripts.predeploy:stage: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:stage && npm run copy
